page.title: 07SPONSORED CYCLE RIDE
page.content: Their aim:to raise Â£2000 for a new school bus. The object:cycle from John O'Groats to Lands End in seven days. Mr Wigglesworth and Mr Stoker were going to ride during Whit Week,already they had been sponsored by top firms,as well as being paid to advertise during the cycle ride. Meanwhile other events to raise money for the bus at school were taking place.Mrs. Butler and Mrs.Lea had a Jumble Sale,Mrs.Lea and her form,2T,sold cakes,biscuits and comics.Mr Stoker and Mr Wigglesworth raffled a bike,10p a ticket.Mr Proffit held a competition to see who could guess how long it would take them to do it.The money made by selling summer fair programmes also went towards the bus.They raised at least Â£2000
